title: How to Increase Minimap size beyond 100%! * r/leagueoflegends

embed.description: 147 points and 67 comments so far on reddit

body: Hi, Im looking for a response from a Rioter to whether this is allowed. Riot Support couldnt provide me with a definite answer. Said its 'at your own risk'.

replies.body: At your own risk means, they don't actively ban for it, but if it's picked up and gets you banned for a modified client then it's on you, and they have no obligation to help you.
